data.title: Real quick, a bit about me:
introParagraph: I was raised in the Bay Area, spent a few years at UCLA getting my degree in Design | Media Arts, and now live in San Francisco with a cat that isn't that great and a dog who is. If I'm not working, I'm probably playing a video game, visiting a ghost town, or at the SF Library researching local history. I'm also very fond of film photography and spend much of my time roaming around, enjoying the company of my camera. You can view some of our time together here.
If you're curious about ghost towns or want to hear about my cat or if you just want to know more about my work (more likely), say hi:

entries.title: FAIRE
entries.subtitle: Product Designer (Contract)
content: Worked through complex end-to-end user experience flows to create functional and beautiful interaction and visual designs
Defined product strategy through identifying user goals, business goals, and user requirements in collaboration with PMs and Engineering
Leveraged data and research to inform design decisions and product strategies
Crafted research plans, conducted interviews, and synthesized data for research efforts aimed at evaluating users needs
Helped to establish Faire’s design system through creating a unified, cohesive set of UX and visual guidelines and components

entries.title: PUNCHCUT
entries.subtitle: Senior Interaction Designer
content: Lead Interaction Designer for web, mobile, tablet, TV, wearables, and automotive products
Led brainstorming and concepting sessions internally and with clients
Developed use cases, personas, wireframes, storyboards, detailed specifications, and prototypes
Led ethnographic user research and analysis activities to uncover user needs and motivations
Delivered detailed design documentation, flows, and specifications
Provided guidance and mentorship to peers and junior team members

entries.title: IGN
entries.subtitle: Interaction Designer
content: Conceptualized and executed redesign of editorial & video content viewing experiences on IGN.com
Developed user experience strategy, vision, and conceptual UI models
Partnered with cross-functional teams to define user needs, opportunities, and product requirements
Provided documentation and oversight to ensure product vision were carried through across product development and implementation process

entries.title: ZINIO
entries.subtitle: Senior Interaction Designer
content: Lead design for cross-platform web and mobile experiences through sketches, wireframes, and prototypes
Consulted with key stakeholders to ensure all interests were considered and vetted
Advocated UX best practices and processes across teams through outreach and workshops
Worked with visual designers and developers to ensure products were launched according to specifications

entries.title: PUNCHCUT
entries.subtitle: Interaction Designer
content: Interaction design for web, mobile, kiosk and TV experiences
Developed diagrams, workflows, personas, and storyboards to conceptualize user experiences
Produced annotated wireframes, interaction specifications, and interactive prototypes

entries.title: LUNAR
entries.subtitle: Visual Interaction Designer
content: Hardware and software designs for medical and consumer devices
Developed concepts, UI models, task flows, wireframes, and prototypes of varying fidelity
Created production assets and documented visual systems for engineering teams

entries.title: SMART DESIGN
entries.subtitle: Visual Interaction Design
content: Created conceptual diagrams, workflows, use cases, personas, user journeys and storyboards for TV, tablet, desktop and embedded UI experience
Concepted through low and high fidelity mockups, storyboarding, sketches, and paper prototypes
Established visual design direction, color palette, layout, iconography, etc

entries.title: UCLA School of the Arts and Architecture
entries.subtitle: BA Design | Media Arts
